item.title: Raincatcher Imperial – Helping change lives around the world
item.author: Kecheng,
item.description: The sky is still dark when Christina leaves the house. She lives with her family in a small village, where more than half a year may pass without a drop of rain. During these dry spells, it is her daily job to fetch more than twenty litres of water from a creek four hours away. She wants to go to …
